tests: INSERT INTO qa_result (run_id, assertion_id, concept_id, details)
SELECT <RUNID>, '<ASSERTIONUUID>', d.conceptid, concat('Current concept (', c.id, ') with "O/E" or "on examination" in any term not modelled for the attribute "Finding informer": ', term)
WHERE  (lower(term) LIKE "%o/e%" OR lower(term) LIKE "%on examination%" )
assertionText: Current concept with "O/E" or "on examination" in any term not modelled for the attribute "Finding informer" with a value of "Performer of method"
docRef: SNOMED CT Style Guide: Clinical Findings Section 2.14 Finding informer
